title: Kyra Yueseff - Novel Updates
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Devoted Love Interests   Heartwarming   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Modern Day   Short Story   Unrequited Love   Younger Love Interests
author: JyJirah
description:
If you’re a Filipino, and your lover cheated on you, what would you do? Will you end your life because of sadness? Hmph! Of course, not!

Even more if you have a very beautiful, very kind, very caring, and super loving neighbor who always does cutesy acts to you.

I am Bing, kneading dough is my work. The neighbor that I’m talking about is Kyra Yueseff, half Syrian-Pilya (Filipina but it can also mean naughty), and she loves eating my bread.

She’s eighteen.

I’m thirty.

And she said that she has a crush on me.>
